name: Santa's Late!
description:
Oh no! Santa slept in, and now he has to rush to deliver the presents! Help Santa navigate the sleeping suburbias and deliver the gifts into people's chimneys before time runs out -- and daylight proves Santa dun messed up!~

Meticulously crafted with Godot and Aseprite, and using sampled PC Speaker sounds, Santa's Lost is a love-letter to ancient gaming technologies. When computers couldn't update sound and video at the same time. When colors were limited to 16 hideous shades chosen by a programmer instead of a designer. When too much on the screen meant meager framerates.

Controls:
Left & Right Arrow Keys /  A & D / D-Pad
Space / Enter / K / DualShock Square /  Xbox X / Left Mouse Click
